name: EverQuest: The Ruins of Kunark
description:
EverQuest: The Ruins of Kunark is a massively multiplayer game developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It came out on 26-01-2000. It was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. EverQuest: The Ruins of Kunark has a Metascore of 86, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
EverQuest: The Ruins of Kunark is available on PC.
